definitions.definition: A woman in the context of her own wedding ; one who is going to marry or has just been married.
( obsolete , figurative ) An object ardently loved.

main_definition: A woman in the context of her own wedding ; one who is going to marry or has just been married.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , figurative ) An object ardently loved.

definitions.definition: an individual loop or other device connecting the patterns in lacework

main_definition: an individual loop or other device connecting the patterns in lacework
